⛔️It does not aim to change China’s…

legacy.full_text:
Pres. Biden reiterated 5 US promises:
⛔️It does not seek a new Cold War with China
⛔️It does not aim to change China’s system
⛔️Revitalization of its alliances is not targeted at China
⛔️It does not support “Taiwan independence”
⛔️It has no intention to seek a conflict with China https://t.co/biT60pc85W

legacy.name: António Guterres

legacy.full_text:
The global financial system was designed by the rich & powerful to benefit the rich & powerful.

Its cruel logic sustains inequalities, rather than fostering development.

Every country deserves a level playing field to unlock its human potential & build strong economies.
